thread.title: Fox Valley GC closing permanently in November
thread.title_full: Fox Valley GC closing permanently in November

title: Fox Valley GC closing permanently in November
text:
Fox Valley GC closing permanently in November Published: Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015 9:28 a.m. CDT By KANE COUNTY CHRONICLE 
NORTH AURORA â€“ Fox Valley Golf Club, a venue for regional golfers for more than four decades, will close permanently after hosting its final rounds on Nov. 1. 
The course and banquet facility at 2500 N. River Road was hampered by aging infrastructure requiring more than $1 million in upgrades and the competitive Fox Valley golf market. 
Earlier this year, the Aurora City Council voted unanimously to sell the facility to Michigan-based Odawa Development, LLC for $5 million. 
"The City of Aurora and golf staff want to thank patrons who have continued to support the Fox Valley Golf Club over the past 40 years," Jeff Schmidt, Aurora PGA operations manager, said in a statement. 
Here's a look at special discounted rates that apply through Nov. 1: 
WEEKDAY SPECIAL RATES * Regular 18-holes w/cart $33.00* Regular Senior 18-holes w/cart $28.00* Regular Twilight w/cart after 2pm $28.00* Regular Super Twilight w/cart after 4pm $22.00* Regular 9-holes w/cart $22.00 
WEEKEND SPECIAL RATES * Regular 18-holes w/cart $37.00* Regular Mid-day 18-holes w/cart $35.00* Regular Twilight w/cart after 2pm $29.00* Regular Super Twilight w/cart after 4pm $24.00 
Those interested can call Fox Valley Golf Club at (630) 879-1030 to schedule a tee time.
